item.description:
Then the room goes silent for a moment until someone change the subject.

So after over three years, I am bowing to the peer pressure and we are having a naming contest. The winner of the contest will receive a fleeting moment of localized fame and a sense of having done something of little or no value to the world.

Please suggest a name for our group by placing it in the comments section for this Meetup. Suggestions can be made until may 31, 2011. A small but as yet unnamed group of our members will then gather, drink a bit to much and pick 5 of the names we like best.

In the first part of June I will place the 5 names selected by our drunken committee on a Meetup poll and have everyone vote on the name of our cooking club. By the end of June we should have a name befitting the personality of the group and living up to our standards and our slogan "We are a drinking club with a cooking problem."

HINT: Consider how our themes are discussed and chosen and make suggestions accordingly.

For inspiration,  I direct you to an old friend of mine from back in the day and how a name that started from drunken happenstance evolved to one of the best loved music venues (by musicians) in the USA. 

http://www.bachddsoc.org/name.html
item.why: Every once in a while someone will say, "We need a name." Then the group around them will chorus, "Yea we should have a name!" & I reply "We have a name, it is the Hartford Cooking and Recipes Club."
item.name: Name the Cooking Club
